'''Don''' came into the ER after accidentally cutting his palm while stabbing his daughter's boyfriend.

==History==
Don came into the ER after stabbing his daughter's much-older boyfriend. Don accidentally cut his palm with the knife and needed stitches. While he was in the ER, he grabbed a hammer and tried to attack Frank a second time, but was stopped when [[Jackson Avery]] tackled him.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
His daughter, [[Jeanie]], is dating a much-older man, something he disapproves of.
